property.name: content
property.description: This is the jinja template for config.properties file
property.value:
################################ #### STREAM SIMULATOR CONFIG #### ################################# #comma-separated list of kafka brokers kafka.brokers={{kafka_broker_host}}:{{kafka_port}}
#Active MQ server activemq.server.url=tcp://{{activemq_host}}:61616
####################### #### WEBAPP CONFIG #### ####################### activemq.server={{activemq_host}} activemq.port=61613 hbase.zookeeper.server={{hbase_master_host}}
###################################### #### STORM TOPOLOGY CONFIGURATION #### ###################################### # Notification Settings for email notification.email=false notification.email.address=user@host.com notification.email.subject=Unsafe Driving Alerts mail.smtp.host=sandbox.hortonworks.com mail.smtp.port=25
# Notification Settings for AMQP topic notification.topic=true notification.topic.user=admin notification.topic.password=admin notification.topic.connection.url=tcp://{{activemq_host}}:61616?wireFormat.maxInactivityDuration=0 notification.topic.alerts.name=driver_alert_notifications notification.topic.events.name=driver_infraction_events notification.all.events.notification.topic=true notification.all.events.notification.topic.name=driver_events
# Kafka Spout Settings kafka.zookeeper.host.port={{kafka_broker_host}}:2181 kafka.topic=truck_events kafka.zkRoot= kafka.consumer.group.id=group1
#parallelism settings spout.thread.count=5 bolt.thread.count=1
#storm topology settings storm.trucker.topology.workers=4
#hdfs bolt settings hdfs.path=/truck-events-v4 hdfs.url=hdfs://{{namenode_host}}:{{namenode_port}} hdfs.file.prefix=truckEvents hdfsbolt.thread.count=4 hdfs.file.rotation.time.minutes=5
#hbase bolt settings hbase.persist.all.events=false
#hive settings hive.metastore.url=thrift://{{hive_metastore_host}}:{{hive_metastore_port}} hive.staging.table.name=truck_events_text_partition hive.database.name=default
#prediction bolt settings #possible values for prediction.engine are jpmml and mllib prediction.engine=jpmml prediction.topic.events.name=prediction_events prediction.topic=true
drools.topic.events.name=drools_events
#storm supervisor servers - comma delimited list supervisors={{supervisor_hosts}}
